input.prompt:
Implement Phase 4: CSS Styling - Task Items

GOAL:  Create CSS styles for task items including checkbox, text, and delete button.

TASKS:
- Style task item container: background #ffffff, border 1px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 6px, padding 12px 16px
- Set task item layout: display flex, align-items center, gap 12px
- Set 8px space between task items
- Style checkbox: 20px × 20px, border 2px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 4px, cursor pointer
- Style checked checkbox: background #16a34a, border-color #16a34a, white checkmark
- Style task text: 16px, font-weight 400, color #1a1a1a, flex 1
- Style delete button: background transparent, color #666666, border none, padding 8px, border-radius 4px, cursor pointer
- Style delete button hover: background #fee2e2, color #dc2626
- Style completed task: text color #666666, text-decoration line-through, opacity 0.7

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Task item has background #ffffff, border 1px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 6px
- Task item has padding 12px 16px
- ...
